channel.title: Shitting Blood
channel.description:
I've been shitting blood. I thought it was cause my mom wanted to save up air miles and she bought really tough toilet paper and I cut my asshole. But now I realized that it might be because my liver is failing and I drink every other day - 7 beers gets me good drunk -- that kind of drunk before you throw up everything.
19:10 ~nade • dude my mom came to my computer 19:10 ~nade • and in my search bar was 19:10 ~nade • "alcahol shitting blood" 19:10 jewish44 • LMFAO
also a not funny picture of me for helping me with my health issues cause im too lazy to go to webmd and type blood in my shit

item.description:
@nade wrote:

I created an account just to answer your question... You might have some form of ulcerative colitis or some sort of inflammatory bowel disease...My brother has it and it sucks. Schedule an appointment with a gastrologist

It’s hem I think. I’m on the fence of whether this is an embarrassing thing or not.

item.title: Shitting Blood
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

nade:

Damn, it happens only sometimes. So, I don’t really want to go to the ass doctor. If I die someone here can have my bike and my computer

I got dibs.

Oh and I will share my blood shitting experience. I went elk hunting for my first time and it was too damn cold to go out to this little shack we made to shit and I thought it was gross. So I held my shit in for like 5 days… one more day till we are home than I could stop somewhere on the way back. My body said fuck that and started to push out. The family was looking for this elk so I decided to stay back at the truck. I grabbed this 1 foot long shovel and started digging. I was in a rush because I didnt want to shit my pants. So there was the first shit… in the wilderness. I would say it was the biggest shit I have ever taken (so far) The relief was amazing. The shit was so orange I didnt know what to expect so I buried it. Then on the way home I took another shit at some restaurant, god that was amazing. Then when I got home after unpacking I took my 3rd and final shit of the day (this was all within 6-8 hours) I looked at my shit to see if it were good and again was orange but I looked at it and noticed I was bleeding. I was so scared I thought I was gonna pass out. But I lived and here I am.

Yea so 3 full on shits in 6-8 hours…idk how my body held it. Oh btw when my family camps we have full on meals breakfast lunch and dinner like full on plates non stop eating. I can’t imagine how much I ate.

Read full topic

item.title: Shitting Blood
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I took a dump once that was pretty hard to pass. Like rock solid. When I wiped there was blood.
Happened again recently, so I went to the doctor. After an examination that confirmed I would certainly never make it as a gay person (first a finger up my arse – and then some sort of scope… female doctor, thank fuck), I was told that everything was okay and that I should eat more fiber etc.

She also warned me that bleeding from the anus is a symptom of bowel cancer, so you may want to seriously consider having it checked out.
It’s a big deal for me though, because my grandmother had bowel cancer, so I have to keep an eye on it etc.

Read full topic
